search.query: |aclinputlookup all_account_ids | mvcombine delim=", " name | nomv name | eval title=account_id." (".name.")"
search state=$state$ | stats count by instance_type
search state=$state$ $instance_type$ | stats count by duration | eval label=round(duration/60/60/24)." days"

`aws-description-resource($accountId$, $region$, "ec2_reserved_instances")` | stats sum(instance_count) as instance_count by aws_account_id id Scope region availability_zone description instance_tenancy instance_type offering_type fixed_price duration end state

search state=$state$ duration=$duration$ $instance_type$ | stats sum(instance_count) as instance_count by aws_account_id id Scope region availability_zone description instance_tenancy instance_type offering_type fixed_price duration end state
stats sum(instance_count) as count by instance_type
stats sum(instance_count) as count by region
stats sum(instance_count) as count by offering_type

eval location = if(availability_zone="null", region, availability_zone), duration=round(duration/60/60/24)." days" | table aws_account_id id Scope location description instance_tenancy instance_type offering_type instance_count fixed_price duration end | sort 0 end | rename aws_account_id as "Account ID", id as "RI ID", instance_type as "Instance Type", instance_tenancy as "Tenancy", instance_count as "Count", description as "Platform", location as "Location", fixed_price as "Fixed Price", duration as "Term", end as "Expire", offering_type as "Payement Option"

table.title: RI Utilization by Family in Last Month

search.query: `aws-ri-info` | eval run_instance_info="" | join type=left aws_account_id, region, platform, tenancy, family [| tstats summariesonly=t count FROM datamodel=Instance_Hour where earliest=-mon@mon-d latest=@mon+d $monthSpl$ by instance_hour.LinkedAccountId, instance_hour.AvailabilityZone, instance_hour.instance_type,instance_hour.platform, instance_hour.tenancy _time span=1h | rename instance_hour.LinkedAccountId as aws_account_id, instance_hour.AvailabilityZone as availability_zone, instance_hour.instance_type as instance_type,instance_hour.platform as platform, instance_hour.tenancy as tenancy | eval availability_zone_len=len(availability_zone), region=substr(availability_zone, 0, availability_zone_len-1) | search $accountId$ $region$ $instance_type$ | lookup ri_billing_to_description billing as tenancy OUTPUT description as tenancy | lookup ri_billing_to_description billing as platform OUTPUT description as platform | `aws-ec2-info` | stats values(run_instance_info) as run_instance_info by aws_account_id, region, platform, tenancy, family] | join type=left aws_account_id [ | tstats summariesonly=t count as is_billing_configured FROM datamodel=Instance_Hour where earliest=-mon@mon latest=@mon by instance_hour.LinkedAccountId | rename instance_hour.LinkedAccountId as aws_account_id] | eval total_hours=(relative_time(now(), "@mon") - relative_time(now(),"-mon@mon"))/3600, run_instance_info=if(isnull(is_billing_configured), "N/A", run_instance_info) | calculateri | table aws_account_id, region, platform, tenancy, family, RI_hours_purchased, RI_hours_used | eval utilization = if(RI_hours_used = "N/A", "N/A", round(RI_hours_used/ RI_hours_purchased*100, 2)) | sort 0 utilization | eval utilization= if(utilization = "N/A", "N/A", utilization."%") | rename aws_account_id as "Account ID", region as "Region", platform as "Platform", tenancy as "Tenancy", family as "Family", RI_hours_purchased as "RI Hours Purchased", RI_hours_used as "RI Hours Used", utilization as "RI Utilization"
